LanguageData.TM_PainHD.label: Pain
LanguageData.TM_PainHD.description: An injury cursed with extreme pain.
LanguageData.TM_EnrageHD.label: Enrage
LanguageData.TM_EnrageHD.description: Consume all positive emotions as fuel for physical power, the spell will fade once all happiness is burned off. While under this curse, a pawn is cannot be staggered, has increased pain resistance, attack speed, and melee damage.
LanguageData.TM_EnrageHD.stages.0.label: I
LanguageData.TM_EnrageHD.stages.1.label: II
LanguageData.TM_EnrageHD.stages.2.label: III
LanguageData.TM_EnrageHD.stages.3.label: IV
LanguageData.TM_EnrageHD.stages.4.label: V
LanguageData.TM_HexHD.label: Hexed
LanguageData.TM_HexHD.description: Under the effects of a hex.
LanguageData.TM_Hex_CriticalFailHD.label: Unlucky
LanguageData.TM_SpiritBondHD.label: Spirit Bond
LanguageData.TM_SpiritBondHD.description: Represents the bond this animal spirit shares with a shaman. Increases physical attributes and enhances healing.
LanguageData.TM_SpiritBondHD.stages.0.label: I
LanguageData.TM_SpiritBondHD.stages.1.label: II
LanguageData.TM_SpiritBondHD.stages.2.label: III
LanguageData.TM_SpiritBondHD.stages.3.label: IV
LanguageData.TM_CrowInsightHD.label: Crows Insight
LanguageData.TM_CrowInsightHD.description: Insight gained from the spirit crow - enhances research speed and psychic sensitivity.
LanguageData.TM_CrowInsightHD.stages.0.label: I
LanguageData.TM_CrowInsightHD.stages.1.label: II
LanguageData.TM_CrowInsightHD.stages.2.label: III
LanguageData.TM_CrowInsightHD.stages.3.label: IV
LanguageData.TM_BirdflightHD.label: flying
